name: Dancing Club Bloodlust
description:
Perfect if you're looking for 10 minutes of fun, with a smooth difficulty curve and a catchy rhythm game!

Progress is saved during the game, feel free to come back to it later.

Please don't go too hard on my bunnies, they just wanted to dance.

This game was originally created in 72h with a team of two for Ludum Dare 41. The Jam version will stay available in the downloads if you're interested.

Please rate the game or leave a comment if you enjoyed! All feedback is very appreciated. I obviously enjoy reading nice comments but if there is something you don't like about the game, or something that made you quit, please tell me so I can improve for my next games.
